SA07n937:2: athaivamukto'pi sa tena bhikṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati |
SA07n937:3: tathā hi tāmeva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ ||1 ||
SA07n937:4: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛṇhāti mumūrṣurāturaḥ |
SA07n937:5: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanairhitaṃ na jagrāha sa tasya tadvacaḥ ||2 ||
SA07n937:6: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtātmanaḥ |
SA07n937:7: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavatyantagataṃ tamastanu ||3 ||
SA07n937:8: tatastathākṣiptamavekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca |
SA07n937:9: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śāntaye ||4 ||
SA07n937:10: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi |
SA07n937:11: ahaṃ tvidaṃ te trayamavyavasthitaṃ yathāvabuddhye na tathāvabudhyase ||5 ||
SA07n937:13: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatāmātmani yena manyase ||6 ||
SA07n937:17: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase ||8 ||
SA07n937:20: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayamāmamāśrito narastitīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam |
SA07n937:22: śarīramāmādapi mṛnmayād ghaṭādidaṃ tu niḥsāratamaṃ mataṃ mama |
SA07n937:23: ciraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivad dhṛto ghaṭaḥ samucchrayo'yaṃ sudhṛto'pi bhidyate ||11 ||
SA07n937:24: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāśca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ |
SA07n937:25: bhavantyanarthāya śarīramāśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi ||12 ||
SA07n937:26: prayānti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyastu bhavanti dhātavaḥ |
SA07n937:27: kvacicca kaṃcicca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ ||13 ||
SA07n937:29: na marṣayatyekamapi vyatikramaṃ yato mahāśīviṣavat prakupyati ||14 ||
SA07n937:30: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidādhābhihato'bhikāṅkṣati |
SA07n937:31: kṣudhānvito'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca ||15 ||
SA07n937:35: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavaḥ mahānti śrṛṅgāṇyaśanirgiretiva ||17 ||
SA07n937:36: kva tad valaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo haresturaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ |
SA07n937:37: yamekabāṇena nijaghnivān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpamivottamaṃ jarā ||18 ||
SA07n937:38: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaścamūrucervā namuceḥ kva tad balam |
SA07n937:39: yamāhave kruddhamivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ ||19 ||
SA07n937:40: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tattadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye |
SA07n937:41: samitsamiddhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ ||20 ||
SA07n937:44: balaṃ mahad yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvadindriyaiḥ |
SA07n937:45: jayaśca te'trāsti mahacca te balaṃ parājayaśced vitathaṃ ca te balam ||22 ||
SA07n937:46: tathā hi vīrāḥ puruṣā na te matā jayanti ye sāśvarathadvipānarīn
SA07n937:47: yathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lolāni ṣaḍindriyāṇi ye ||23 ||
SA07n937:48: ahaṃ vapuṣmāniti yacca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitadidaṃ ca gṛhyatām |
SA07n937:49: kva tadvapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanurgadasya śāmbasya ca sāraṇasya ca ||24 ||
SA07n937:50: yathā mayūraścalacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ |
SA07n937:51: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇādṛte tathā bibharti rūpaṃ yadi rūpavānasi ||25 ||
SA07n937:52: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyānna vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśedapaḥ |
SA07n937:53: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapurvapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet ||26 ||
SA07n937:54: navaṃ vayaścātmagataṃ niśāmya yadgṛ honmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ |
SA07n937:55: niyaccha tacchailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchatyanivarti yauvanam ||27 ||
SA07n937:56: ṛturvyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṃ prayātaḥ punareti candramāḥ |
SA07n937:57: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam ||28 ||
SA07n937:59: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi ||29 ||
SA07n937:60: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyamuttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati |
SA07n937:61: narastu matto balarūpayouvanairna kaścidaprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati ||30 ||
SA07n937:64: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapatramīritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinattyanekadhā |
SA07n937:66: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ |
SA07n937:67: śramasya yonirbalavīryayorvadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ ||33 ||
SA07n937:68: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidhānaṃ jagato mahabhdayam |
SA07n937:69: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānamāroḍhumanāryamarhasi ||34 ||
SA07n937:70: ahaṃ mametyeva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ |
SA07n937:71: tamutsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hyahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati ||35 ||
SA07n937:72: yadā śarīre na vaśo'sti kasyacinnirasyamāne vividhairupaplavaiḥ |
SA07n937:73: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettumahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛhamāpadāmidam ||36 ||
SA07n937:74: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte'bale |
SA07n937:75: sa duṣṭadhātāvaśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītadarśanaḥ ||37 ||
SA07n937:76: yathā prajābhyaḥ kunṛpo balād balīn haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cābhirakṣati |
SA07n937:77: tathaiva kāyo vasanādisādhanaṃ haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cānuvartate ||38 ||
SA07n937:78: yathā prarohanti tṛṇānyayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavanti śālayaḥ |
SA07n937:79: tathaiva duḥkhāni bhavantyayatnataḥ sukhāni yatnena bhavanti vā na vā ||39 ||
SA07n937:80: śarīramārtaṃ parikarṣataścalaṃ na cāsti kiñcit paramārthataḥ sukham |
SA07n937:81: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyavasyati ||40 ||
SA07n937:83: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkhamāgataṃ na vidyate kiñcana kasyacit sukhaṃ ||41 ||
SA07n937:86: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasoriva |
SA07n937:87: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate ||43 ||
SA07n937:88: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati |
SA07n937:90: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam |
SA07n937:91: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā ||45 ||
SA07n937:92: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā |
SA07n937:93: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ ||46 ||
SA07n937:94: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ |
SA07n937:95: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ ||47 ||
SA07n937:96: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye |
SA07n937:97: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye ||48 ||
SA07n937:99: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram ||49 ||
SA07n937:100: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ |
SA07n937:101: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ ||50 ||
SA07n937:106: saundarananda mahākāvye “abhimāna-nindā“ nāma navama sarga samāpta |
